content: drops christmas knitted drops christmas stockinette with norwegian pattern in karisma drops extra 0-986 drops design pattern no u-721 yarn group b sock height approx 35 cm foot length approx 25 cm materials drops karisma from garnstudio 150 g colour no 48 wine red 100 g colour no 01 off white drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm - or size needed to get 23 sts x 32 row in pattern = 10 x 10 cm drops circular needle 40 cm size 2 5 mm for folding edge accessories 1 meter red silk ribbon for hanging uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=6385&cid=19
